NodeAttributes.title: largest positive finite value of the number type
smallest positive nonzero value of the number type
area of circle - diameter
NodeAttributes.expression: var r = diameter / 2.0; Math.PI * r * r

NodeAttributes.title: direct values
define functions
Unary Normal probability density function
Unary Standard normal probability density function
Univariate Normal probability density function
Univariate Standard normal probability density function
law of sines - for angle(radian)
NodeAttributes.expression: var sinB = Math.sin(angleA_radian ) * edge_b / edge_a; Math.asin(sinB)

NodeAttributes.title: law of sines - for angle(angle)
law of sines - for edge(angle)
law of cosines - for edge(radian)
NodeAttributes.expression: Math.sqrt(edge_b * edge_b + edge_c * edge_c - 2 * edge_b * edge_c * Math.cos(angleA_radian ))

NodeAttributes.title: law of cosines - for edge(angle)
NodeAttributes.expression: var cosA = Math.cos(angleA_angle * Math.PI / 180); Math.sqrt(edge_b * edge_b + edge_c * edge_c - 2 * edge_b * edge_c * cosA)

NodeAttributes.title: law of cosines - for angle(radian)
NodeAttributes.expression: var cosA = (edge_b * edge_b + edge_c * edge_c - edge_a * edge_a) / (2 * edge_b * edge_c); Math.acos( cosA )

NodeAttributes.title: law of cosines - for angle(angle)
NodeAttributes.expression: var cosA = (edge_b * edge_b + edge_c * edge_c - edge_a * edge_a) / (2 * edge_b * edge_c); Math.acos( cosA ) * 180 / Math.PI

NodeAttributes.title: area of ellipsoid - half_axie
NodeAttributes.expression: 4 * Math.PI * ( half_axie_a * half_axie_b + half_axie_a * half_axie_c + half_axie_b * half_axie_c )/ 3

NodeAttributes.title: area of ellipsoid - axie
NodeAttributes.expression: Math.PI * ( axie_a * axie_b + axie_a * axie_c + axie_b * axie_c )/ 3

NodeAttributes.title: area of cube
NodeAttributes.expression: 2 * ( length * width + length * height + width * height )
